function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Debates in the public sphere about the ’new normal’ and post-covid-19 world may impact attitudes towards green stimulus and sustainable policies.","category":"Globalization challenges","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Normalization of existing disease patterns and organizational methods","category":"Lack of global governance and coordination","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited examples of institutionalizing participatory approaches in developing countries with limited resources and weak institutional support.","category":"Weak local decision-making mechanisms","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The lack of national ownership and government-driven initiatives may hinder the effective scale-up of disease control efforts, leading to limited impact at a national level.","category":"Weak local decision-making mechanisms","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Bureaucratic and institutional inflexibility leading to lack of tailored approaches","category":"Lack of coordination and consistency in mitigation measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainties in modeling efforts for policy design and programmatic orientation","category":"Ineffectiveness of interventions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate response to global commitments in addressing vbd scenarios","category":"Ineffectiveness of interventions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of political will and funding for scale-up of disease prevention and control tools","category":"Weak local decision-making mechanisms","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Need for modification of existing guidelines and plans to incorporate participatory planning and intersectoral collaboration","category":"Weak local decision-making mechanisms","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient dissemination of the empowerment approach to government decision-makers","category":"Weak local decision-making mechanisms","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate link between research, policy, and action in real-time.","category":"Lack of coordination and consistency in mitigation measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinformation and lack of trust in public health actions","category":"Trust and transparency challenges","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misuse of whatsapp leading to circulation of fake news and misinformation","category":"Lack of transparency and clarity","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of freedom of movement facilitating transmission of mechanisms","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Racial disparities in eviction risk during covid-19","category":"Globalization challenges","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Higher eviction rates for black and coordination","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Grounding housing fund construction on socialist principles","category":"Globalization challenges","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transition
